oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Memphis, Tenn." Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Memphis, Tenn. -- On the Levee." -- Exterior Side Two: "Memphis and Harahan Bridges, Spanning Mississippi River."

Interior: "Memphis, Tenn. -- Information for the Convenience of Visitors" introductory text, with handwritten note, "Joe Williams -- Memphis /17/21"; "Shelby County Court House" image; "River Front" image; "New Union Depot" image; "Forest Park" [sic] image; "Main and Madison" image; "Cossitt Library and Post Office" image; "Exchange Building" image; "Main Street, looking North" image; "Main Building, West Tennessee State Normal School" image; "Sunken Garden and Speedway" image; Grand Central Station" image; "Memphis and Harrihan [sic] Bridges, Spanning Mississippi River" image;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: downtown; bridges; buildings; parks; riverfront; streets; train stations;
